title: 想升级，水个贴
author: Jurassiccraft
txt_content:
水水水……
其实也不全是水的呢
我的欧气很强哦
你想知道吗
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1011740-1-1.html
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1011771-1-1.html
去看看吧！



到了6级就发锭啦
想吸欧气就给点人气吧！

replies.author: 专刀你
replies.txt_content: 还久呢，

replies.author: Volta_X
replies.txt_content: 我下周再来找你

replies.author: 许灬愿
replies.txt_content: 加油吧，努力水，只要别太过分

replies.author: 曦灬月
replies.txt_content: 5天后见，走好

replies.author: 迷灬离
replies.txt_content: 你真够氵

replies.author: 0-zero-0
replies.txt_content: 你今天第几次氵主题了？

replies.author: 0-zero-0
replies.txt_content: 水帖适当！

replies.author: 在下晴天
replies.txt_content: 表示内容要充实才能给传送门合集

replies.author: 迷灬离
replies.txt_content:
0-zero-0 发表于 2020-4-8 18:08
水帖适当！
你也在氵啊

replies.author: 微渺之星
replies.txt_content: 明年见！一路走好！

replies.author: 0-zero-0
replies.txt_content:
muyu_fxiaold 发表于 2020-4-8 18:09
你也在氵啊
反反其水象而行之，岂为吾等氵哉！

replies.author: 迷灬离
replies.txt_content:
0-zero-0 发表于 2020-4-8 18:13
反反其水象而行之，岂为吾等氵哉！
看，你又氵一贴

replies.author: Lurenccc
replies.txt_content: 水贴警告。

replies.author: Q奇拉比奇拉比
replies.txt_content: 我们一起加油！
